about_the_game:
This is a Cyberpunk style role-playing game. Players don't need a lot of operations, they just need to think about some strategies to complete the victory.


There are 6 classes for players to choose from.
They are Blade, Magic Power, Doctor, Chaser, Poison Master, and Paladin.
Each profession has different characteristics.
Blade: Good at melee and group attack.
Magic power: Long range, explosive group attack class.
Doctor: With strong recovery ability, we can play an excellent role in teamwork.
Chasing: High explosive long-range attack class.
Poison Master: A powerful group attack class.
Paladin: Powerful recovery ability, suitable for team fighting.


There are three different tasks in the game.
Each task can be of different difficulty.
You can get different rewards after completing each task successfully.


Build the system.
The props obtained in the mission can be used to cast different equipment.
You have a chance to obtain legendary equipment.


Game features:
Each profession has 8 skills. However, players can only select 4 skills to use. This requires players to match different skills according to the needs of the fight.
Each profession has a transformation skill, which can make itself stronger.

name: Idle Cyber Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3470 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R7 260X
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This is a Cyberpunk style role-playing game. Players don't need a lot of operations, they just need to think about some strategies to complete the victory.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
